name: Bronze
description: Try before buying! You get all of our great features, but with a limit of 1 presentation, and a maximum Media Storage Capacity of 25 Mb.

name: Silver (Month)
description: You get all of our features plus all the keyslides you want, and a maximum Media Storage Capacity of 100 MB.

name: Gold (Month)
description: You get all features, no keyslide quantity limit and maximum Media Storage Capacity of 500 MB. Also, you get access to new features weeks before everyone else.

name: Silver (Year)
description: You get all of our features plus all the keyslides you want, and a maximum Media Storage Capacity of 100 MB.

name: Gold (Year)
description: You get all features, no keyslide quantity limit and maximum Media Storage Capacity of 500 MB. Also, you get access to new features weeks before everyone else.
